caption:
A nightmare in the flesh, these are brought to life during the day and shows their true colors at night through a color shifting heat reactive upper. These New Era & TBG fitted bring the halloween spirit to life with the latest tech. Each fitted changes colors depending on the heat index for a truly 1-of-1 experience. Available on 10.25 at 9:00 PM CST Online for $55

New Era X TBG Houston Astros Fitted Thermal Nightmare “Jack-O-Latern”
Sizes 6 7/8 - 7 5/8

New Era X TBG Houston Astros Fitted Thermal Nightmare “Goblin”
Sizes 6 7/8 - 7 3/4 

New Era X TBG Houston Astros Fitted Thermal Nightmare “Ghoul”
Sizes 7 - 7 3/4
